FuncDef: This command configures the number of events and interval length to be applied to all event types that have throttling enabled by theevent-controlcommand and do not have aspecific-throttle-rateconfigured.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of log events that can be logged within the specified interval for a specific event. Once the limit has been reached, any additional events of that type will be dropped, for example, the event drop count will be incremented. At the end of the throttle interval if any events have been dropped a trap notification will be sent. Values-1 to 20000. ParamDefault: Default- 2000
Specifies the number of seconds that an event throttling interval lasts. Values-1 to 1200. ParamDefault: Default- 1
